page.title: 16RESIDENTIAL HOMES IN HEDON
page.content: { Albemarle}residential home was opened in 1971 and at present has 43 old people living there.The corridors have coloured tiles on the floor.Red and black leads to the main entrance.There are 4 double bedrooms and the rest are single rooms.There are {ambulifts} in the bathrooms which are used to raise and lower an old person into the bath.Each bedroom has a commode because 50% of the residents are incontinent. {Holyrood House}was built in 1885 and was owned by Major Watson,and in 1959 was converted into the comfortable Home it is today.The oldest person there is 103 on 12th August 1985,she is a nice old lady.In order to make new residents feel at home more quickly they have kept the original style of the once private residence.
